data.name: Skye
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Skye is a hyper-realistic survival game set on the Isle of Skye during the Viking period. Washed ashore you will fight both the elements and the island's natural predators for survival in a bid to find out how you came to be upon its shores.



Eilean a' Cheò
Explore the entirety of Skyes rugged terrain in stunning size and detail, whilst battling the gruesome Scottish climate on the aptly named ‘Eilean a' Cheò’ - The Misty Isle.



Reap what you sow and hunt to survive
Prowl the lands and hunt deer, wolves, foxes and many more animals! Cultivate your crops and be rewarded with a bountiful harvest!



Gaze into the shields of the Valkyrie
Observe before your eyes as the skies burst with colour! The angels of death lead the brave fallen warriors to Valhalla. Survey the bright stars at night to find your way onwards.


Current features:
  • Massive 256km2 map set on the real-world location of the Isle of Skye in incredible 1:4 scale
  • Stunning next-gen visuals brought to life using a highly-customised Unreal Engine 5
  • Choose your view, switch between first AND third-person views!
  • Explore vast open grasslands, the towering Cuillin mountains, and dark forests as you fight to gather resources to survive.
  • Choose from a selection of pre-built buildings or create your own using modular structures to help you battle the elements and dangers of the island.
  • Craft a vast array of real-world items to harvest resources and protect yourself in the game.
  • An intuitive real-world system that makes creating objects and navigating the world feel more natural.
  • Brave the misty isle with the true to life weather system that changes with the seasons.


*All footage and images captured from actual gameplay or using our in-game photo mode

data.short_description: Skye is a hyper-realistic survival game set on the Isle of Skye during the Viking period. Washed ashore you will fight both the elements and the island's natural predators for survival in a bid to find out how you came to be upon its shores.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10 / 1909 r.1530
  • Processor: i7-7700 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low/Medium settings. 10GB HDD space recommended. Specs subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 1909 r.1530 or above
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 5950X or Equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Ryzen RX 6600 XT 8GB / GeForce RTX 3060 12GB or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High/Epic Settings. 15GB SDD space recommended. Specs subject to change.

data.legal_notice: All images and video content shared by Aurora Game Studios uploaded to Steam are the intellectual property of Aurora Game Studios and should be credited as such if used on any site or promotional material other than an official channel. Unless otherwise stated or agreed upon, material belonging to Skye Game and Aurora Game Studios should not be used in a manner that would suggest endorsement of any person or product and appropriate credit should always be given.
